name: Horse Pile
description:
Game submission for Ludem Dare: 49
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49

Stack horses as high as you can to reach the stable!

Horses stick together when touched.

Controls:

Mouse Movement - Steer Helicopter

Left Click - Drop Horse

Credits:

Game by: Ben Parisi and Jonathan Lapsley

Music: Wonderland by Synapsis 

Fonts: Tom Murphy

SFX: Earthworm Jim, Donkey Kong, Dark Souls.

Models(Turbosquid): Barn-Mechanic3d, Horse-Evilvoland, Helicopter-Giantformlabs
